translations: 切断腿筋使成跛腿；使残废

sentences.sentence: "I was a bit gutted, as I strained my hamstring again on Friday, " said Richards.
sentences.translation: “我有点沮丧，因为我在周五再次拉伤了我的腿筋。”理查兹说。
她拉伤了一条腘绳肌腱。

sentences.sentence: He felt a slight twinge in his damaged hamstring.
sentences.translation: 他感受到受伤的腘绳肌处有一阵轻微的剧痛。
